concept.title: For Undergraduate Students
concept.shortdesc: Students who are in their freshman, sophomore, junior, or senior year at university have certain classroom needs that Airclassroom can fulfill!

conbody.p:
Multicultural College Students Smiling at the Camera
Undergraduate students are a sensitive collection of individuals and increasingly need classroom spaces that are tailored to their needs. As these students have learned being away from mother and father, the real world is a frightening place where one can encounter an offensive remark at any point in time. Truly, no one is safe from the possibility of being triggered. Thankfully, Airclassroom is here to provide these special snowflakes the opportunity to rent classrooms to protect them from the offensive outside world.

Our classrooms are certified as Safe Spaces for students in need, complete with trigger warnings to alert students to any possible touchy subjects that might arise while participating in their higher education.
A Safe Space is a place where anyone can relax and be able to fully express, without fear of being made to feel uncomfortable, unwelcome, or unsafe on account of biological sex, race/ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, cultural background, religious affiliation, age, or physical or mental ability.
